insults.title: Hello Bonsai#8521!
insults.description: {insert insult later}, and any other insults are not allowed 🤐

advices.title: Use fun alternatives instead! Or doodle your feelings out! 😉
advices.description: Please be polite to others and to yourself <3.

extremeBehaviour.title: Hello {username}!
extremeBehaviour.description: This is a safe and comfortable space for all. If you're upset or feeling down, please refer to the resources below!

advices.title: HELP IS ALWAYS AVAILABLE. WE ARE ALWAYS HERE FOR YOU <3
S*icide suggests ill intent or self-harm
advices.description: Always be kind and take care of yourself. Be mindful of others!
